movies.title: Gagarin. Pervyy v kosmose
movies.plot: GAGARIN: FIRST IN SPACE, is a feature film featuring amazing SFX, that celebrates the bravery and achievements of Yuri Gagarin - the first man in space. On April 12, 1961, Soviet cosmonaut Gagarin blasted off in a Vostok rocket and he orbited Earth for 108 minutes. He was the cosmonaut who was selected from over three thousand fighter pilots throughout the Soviet Union. Once chosen Gagarin is fast tracked to train for the unknown and the trip of a life time!
movies.simplePlot: GAGARIN: FIRST IN SPACE, is a feature film featuring amazing SFX, that celebrates the bravery and achievements of Yuri Gagarin - the first man in space. On April 12, 1961, Soviet cosmonaut ...

biography.placeOfBirth: Nizhny Tagil, Sverdlovsk Oblast, Russian SFSR, USSR
biography.bio: Yaroslav Zhalnin was born on March 25, 1986 in Nizhny Tagil, Sverdlovsk Oblast, Russian SFSR, USSR. He is an actor and writer, known for Gagarin. Pervyy v kosmose (2013), Elena (2011) and Metro (2013).
biography.name: Yaroslav Zhalnin

biography.bio: Mikhail Filippov was born on August 15, 1947 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Mikhail Ivanovich Filippov. He is an actor, known for Gagarin. Pervyy v kosmose (2013), The Spy (2012) and Peterburgskie tayny (1994).
biography.name: Mikhail Filippov

biography.bio: Olga Ivanova was born on February 4, 1984 in Vitebsk, Byelorussian SSR, USSR. She is an actress, known for Gagarin. Pervyy v kosmose (2013), Hipsters (2008) and Mat i machekha (2012).
biography.name: Olga Ivanova

biography.bio: Vadim Michman is an actor, known for Gagarin. Pervyy v kosmose (2013) and Step bay step (2011).
biography.name: Vadim Michman

biography.placeOfBirth: Karaganda, Kazakh SSR, USSR [now Qaraghandy, Kazakhstan]
biography.bio: Vladimir Steklov was born on January 3, 1948 in Karaganda, Kazakh SSR, USSR as Vladimir Aleksandrovich Steklov. He is an actor, known for Kadetstvo (2006), Bomzh (Bez opredelyonnogo mesta zhitelstva) (1988) and Kriminalnyy kvartet (1989).
biography.name: Vladimir Steklov

biography.placeOfBirth: Atbasar, Akmolinsk Oblast, Kazakh SSR, USSR [now Kazakhstan]
biography.bio: Viktor Proskurin was born on February 8, 1952 in Atbasar, Akmolinsk Oblast, Kazakh SSR, USSR as Viktor Alekseyevich Proskurin. He is an actor, known for A Cruel Romance (1984), Pikovaya dama (1982) and Den khomyachka (2003). He was previously married to Svetlana Proskurina and Olga Gavrilyuk.
biography.name: Viktor Proskurin

biography.placeOfBirth: Dmitrievka, Nikiforovskiy rayon, Tambovskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR [now Russia]
biography.bio: Nadezhda Markina was born on January 29, 1959 in Dmitrievka, Nikiforovskiy rayon, Tambovskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR as Nadezhda Konstantinovna Markina. She is an actress, known for Elena (2011), Criminel (2015) and In the Fog (2012).
biography.name: Nadezhda Markina

biography.bio: Studied acting in The Gerasimov Institute of Cinematography in Moscow. Began his career in the film directed by Eugeni Ginzburg Voices of fish (2008). Allso known for his performance in TV series Bros (2009-2014). Next he starred in Robin Kampiyo's Eastern Boys (2012) . The film was nominated for 3 French César awards. Vorobyov later starred in the romantic drama Out of love (2016). The film took part in the Rotterdam Film Festival (IFFR 2016) in the main program Bright Future. The short film Prayer the debut of Vorobyov as director in co-creation with Eugene Tkachuk received 12 awards at various festivals. In the summer of 2015 Vorobyov became the writer/director of the short film Silent Water, the shooting took place in Kostroma.
biography.name: Daniil Vorobyov

biography.placeOfBirth: Kyshtym, Chelyabinsk Oblast, RSFSR, USSR [now Russia]
biography.bio: Inga Strelkova-Oboldina was born on December 23, 1968 in Kyshtym, Chelyabinsk Oblast, RSFSR, USSR as Inga Petrovna Gudimova. She is an actress, known for The Conductor (2012), It Doesn't Hurt Me (2006) and Sky. Plane. Girl (2002).
biography.name: Inga Strelkova-Oboldina

biography.bio: Sergey Tezov was born on July 2, 1961 as Sergey Leonidovich Tezov. He is an actor, known for Gagarin. Pervyy v kosmose (2013), Komanda 33 (1987) and Vverkh tormashkami (1992).
biography.name: Sergey Tezov

biography.placeOfBirth: Revda, Sverdlovsk Oblast, Russian SFSR, USSR [now Russia]
biography.bio: Anatoliy Otradnov was born on March 6, 1982 in Revda, Sverdlovsk Oblast, Russian SFSR, USSR as Anatoli Sergeevitch Otradnov. He was an actor, known for The Alien Girl (2010), Gagarin. Pervyy v kosmose (2013) and First on the Moon (2005). He died on January 30, 2012 in Chelobityevo, Moscow Oblast, Russia.
biography.name: Anatoliy Otradnov

biography.bio: Vladimir Chuprikov was born on July 24, 1964 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Vladimir Olegovich Chuprikov. He is an actor, known for Gagarin. Pervyy v kosmose (2013), The Snow Queen 2 - La Reine des Neiges: Le Miroir Sacré (2014) and Lyubov - ne to, chto kazhetsya... (2009).
biography.name: Vladimir Chuprikov

biography.bio: Evgeniy Tkachuk was born on July 23, 1984 in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan. When he was ten, his family moved to Syzran, Samarskaya region, Russia. His father is an actor in the Drama theatre of Syzran and his mother is a physician, PhD in medical sciences. From the very childhood he was in the theatre and spent a lot of time in the backstage, watching the performances. Together with studies in the high school, Evgeniy played plenty of leading roles in the Drama theatre of Syzran. In 2002, after graduating from the high school, Evgeniy moved to Moscow and attended the Russian University of Theatre Arts (GITIS), Department of Directing of the Dramatic Theatre, Workshop of O. Kudrjashov, which successfully graduated in 2006. Being the student of the IV course, he was invited to play the role of Hippolytus/Boy in the "Phaedra, Golden Spike" (Director A. Zholdak) in the Theatre of Nations (Moscow). For this performance he was awarded with Prize of the MK "For the Best Debut". After graduation from the Academy in 2006, Evgeniy Tkachuk was awarded with Prize, named by the People's Artist of USSR Mikhail Tsarev "For the successful comprehension of the Actor's profession".
biography.name: Evgeniy Tkachuk

biography.bio: Sergey Laktyunkin is an actor, known for Gagarin. Pervyy v kosmose (2013), Grozovye vorota (2006) and Istoriya Vesennego Prizyva (2003).
biography.name: Sergey Laktyunkin

biography.bio: Anatoliy Gushchin was born on November 30, 1976 in the USSR. He is an actor, known for The Star (2002), Viy (2014) and SMERSH: Legenda dlya predatelya (2011).
biography.name: Anatoliy Gushchin

categories.category: Best Russian Drama of the Year
